addr: 1 Industry Hills Parkway City of Industry, CA 91744
title: NCNW SO CA Area Bethune-Height Recognition Luncheon & 80th Anniversary Celebration
desc: The National Council of Negro Women (NCNW) Southern California Area will host their 1st Annual combined Bethune-Height Recognition Luncheon with a twist because they will also celebrate the 80th Anniversary of this great historical organization. We are excited about this event and pray that you will be in attendance for this joyous event.
